segments.text: In the past half year , we made some schedules and objectives , do you still remember that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I spent the whole week to know the general process for these plans . And since I was employed , I have been working on them . Madam , how am I doing ? Are you satisfied with my job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you feel what you have done ? Did you meet our goals ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose so . I tried my best to be familiar with all these appliances and office process . Certainly without my colleagues ' help , I could not do these things in such a short period .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . And you also overworked in last month , when Steven asked for leave . I have been very satisfied with your performance . And your dependability has been a great asset .
segments.speaker: S1
